title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Torah Cover with Repeating "Shin"", 1950
medium: Brush and gold and silver paint on colored paper
signed: Signed in blue ballpoint on mount beneath lower right corner of image:  T. Guermonprez
inscribed: Recto:  inscribed in blue ballpoint pen on mount beneath lower left corner of drawing:  FABRIC FOR/THORA (sic) MANTEL; beneath this, in pen and blue ink:  material 48" wide; in blue ballpoint, on mount beneath lower right corner of drawing:  1 1/2" = 1'0"; verso:  yellow label glued to upper left corner, printed with "Trude Guermonprez"/typed, Pond Farm/Guerneville, CA; inscribed in blue marking pen, lower right corner of label:  Aug. 10th 1950
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Hebrew character "Shin" repeated four times across and five times down in gold on fushia-color, silver-splattered paper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Woven Torah Cover with Repeating "Shin"", 1950.
1950. Brush and gold and silver paint on colored paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-47.
